scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Amandasantana
scrape.text: I really disliked the characters in this book. Especially the narrator. The author did a great job of making you think he was somehow the moral center only to pull the rug out and tip everything on its head. Turns out only the asshole brother was the only one trying to do the right thing. I don’t understand this genre where the parents are willing to do anything to cover for their children’s misdeeds...
